document.full_text: hawtai motor of beijing took a 29.9 percent stake in saab's parent, spyker cars, and lent saab 30 million euros to restart production.
document.title: saab gets a financing lifeline in deal with beijing carmaker
lines_and_colors: hawtai motor of beijing took a 29.9 percent stake in saab's parent, spyker cars, and lent saab 30 million euros to restart production.
